scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a young man, likely a saint, seated and holding a stone in his left hand. He wears a reddish-brown robe with gold ornamentation over a white tunic. His hair is short and styled with a topknot, and he has a golden halo. The background is a landscape with rolling blue hills, green fields, and stylized clouds. In the distance, several indistinct architectural structures, possibly towers or buildings, are visible. The scene is framed by a decorative gold border.
